snippet: AMC is following the strategy it took with “Breaking Bad” in dividing up a final season into two installments, and it will be waiting a full year between arcs.
abstract: AMC will air final season of hit series Mad Men in two runs with full year in between.
lead_paragraph: AMC is following the strategy it took with “Breaking Bad” in dividing up a final season into two installments, and it will be waiting a full year between arcs.

headline.main: ‘Mad Men’ to Split Final Season Into Two Parts
headline.print_headline: ‘Mad Men’ Splitting Its Planned Last Season
